articles.content:
Harry Styles' latest single As It Was has debuted in the charts at number one, knocking Dave out of the top spot after his four-week reign.

articles.title: ‘I’m completely devoted to one person’: David Hyde Pierce on love, death and the Frasier reboot - The Guardian
articles.description: Nearly 30 years since he wowed the world as Niles in Frasier, David Hyde Pierce has been lured back to TV as chef Julia Child’s adoring husband. He talks about food, sex – and whether he’ll soon be reuniting with Kelsey Grammer
